channel.title: Iceblitz -Summoning/Dung/Rewritten combat-
channel.description:
[center]Iceblitz 100% NPC,Summoning,Player clipping High rewritten combat system Good working Summoning & Dung Skilling redone & all Mini-Gs working High stability, Handles over 200
Already bought the domain/host Putting alot of $ in this project, and im looking for a client developer
Contact me if you are good in client-side! Skype: rafr200[/center]

item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Ok you should add information about the server and an update log. Also dont use white text, and get media that is cropped so we just the client. You would get a lot better feedback that way.

Anyways good luck.
